device_name: Antimicrobial Wound Dressing with Silver Sulfadiazine
intended_use: HealGuard-Ag is intended for use as a primary wound dressing for the management of partial and full-thickness wounds including burns (second degree), chronic wounds (diabetic foot ulcers, pressure injuries), and donor sites. The silver sulfadiazine drug component provides antimicrobial activity to reduce wound bioburden.
device_description: HealGuard-Ag is a combination product (device primary mode of action) consisting of: (1) a non-adherent polyurethane foam wound contact layer impregnated with 1% silver sulfadiazine (SSD) cream; (2) an absorbent polyurethane foam core; and (3) a semi-occlusive polyurethane film outer backing with moisture vapor transmission rate (MVTR) of 800–1200 g/m²/24h. Available sizes: 10×10 cm, 15×15 cm, 20×20 cm. The device is supplied sterile (gamma irradiation, 25 kGy) and latex-free.
materials: Polyurethane foam (wound contact layer and absorbent core)
sterilization_text: Sterilized by gamma irradiation at 25 kGy minimum dose per ISO 11137-1. SAL 10^-6.

extracted_sections.biocompatibility: ISO 10993-1 evaluation. Cytotoxicity, sensitization, and skin irritation testing completed. SSD ingredient OTC-monograph compliant.
extracted_sections.labeling: OTC labeling per 21 CFR 333 Subpart D (antimicrobial) and 21 CFR 880.5900 (wound dressing).
